metadata.title: Tuesday, 19th March, 2024
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the construction of Chieftainess Mwenda’s palace in Chikankata District has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) whether the Government is aware that there has been illegal gold mining in Khumba Ward in Chadiza Parliamentary Constituency that has led to lawlessness in the area; and
(b) if so, what measures are being taken to ensure legal mining and restoration of law and order.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) when the Government will commence rehabilitation of feeder roads in Kalabo District;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the works is; and
(c) when the works will be completed.
(a) when the Government will electrify the following schools in Kapoche Parliamentary Constituency:

(i) Kondwelani Primary; (vi) Mtema Primary; (ii) Chikalaba Primary and Junior (vii) Nchembwe Primary; Secondary; (iii) Chataika Primary; (viii) Kapungwe Day Secondary; and (iv) Chimpundu Primary; (ix) Mtandadza Secondary;and
(v) Matambazi Primary;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to construct veterinary clinics in Magoye Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, how many clinics are earmarked for construction;
(c) what the estimated cost of the project is; and
(d) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) how many goods and passenger trains the Zambia Railways Limited procured between 2011 and 2021;
(b) what the cost of each train was;
(c) how much money was generated from the operations of the trains during the period above;
(d) whether the Government has any plans to procureadditional locomotive trains, including electric trains;
(e) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(f) how many people were employed during the period at (a). NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Mung’andu Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address: That the thanks of this Assembly be recorded for the exposition of public policy contained in His Excellency the President’s Address. ___________________________
